description:
Sweet, crunchy, and satisfying, Prana Organic’s Susuma bites are great on the trail, as road trip snacks, or any time your feeling snackish. Dry roasted organic sesame seeds held together with fairtrade cane sugar; these delicious bites are like the sesame snaps of your childhood got the ultimate glow-up.

  • Ingredients: sesame seeds*, cane sugar*. *Organic
  • Allergens: may contain: almonds, Brazil nuts, cashews, hazelnuts, pecans, pistachios, walnuts, milk and soya
  • Prana is Montreal based family business committed to making healthy and delicious snacks, with low impact. When possible, Prana Organics uses locally sourced organic ingredients. When they can’t find what they need nearby, Prana Organics ensure the farmers they work with use sustainable farming practices and have fair working environments
name: Prana Organic Sumsuma Sesame Bites
